data.name: CINEVR - Social Movie Theater
data.detailed_description:
Introducing a multiplayer 3D movie theater to experience videos in VR

  • Immersive & social user experience: Movies are social. So you can invite up to 4 friends to watch videos simultaneously, with conversations & emojis!
  • High quality VR theater: We designed a realistic 3D movie theater optimized for mobile VR with high quality textures & various lightings effects.
  • Spatialized sound: Audio tracks are played in a 360° environment to a high quality immersive experience. You can also discuss with friends.
  • Friends & reactions: Invite your friends & watch videos together with audio conversation & fun interactions.
  • Dynamic lighting: We built optimized dynamic lighting that reflect bright & colors in the room.

HD movies, 360 & more: watch premium HD movies, 3D movies, TV Shows. Our dynamic streaming video player plays videos from various sources & uses DRM to secure premium movies.

This app will be often updated in the coming weeks so stay tuned!
You can also follow @CINEMUR on Twitter.
data.about_the_game:
Introducing a multiplayer 3D movie theater to experience videos in VR

  • Immersive & social user experience: Movies are social. So you can invite up to 4 friends to watch videos simultaneously, with conversations & emojis!
  • High quality VR theater: We designed a realistic 3D movie theater optimized for mobile VR with high quality textures & various lightings effects.
  • Spatialized sound: Audio tracks are played in a 360° environment to a high quality immersive experience. You can also discuss with friends.
  • Friends & reactions: Invite your friends & watch videos together with audio conversation & fun interactions.
  • Dynamic lighting: We built optimized dynamic lighting that reflect bright & colors in the room.

HD movies, 360 & more: watch premium HD movies, 3D movies, TV Shows. Our dynamic streaming video player plays videos from various sources & uses DRM to secure premium movies.

This app will be often updated in the coming weeks so stay tuned!
You can also follow @CINEMUR on Twitter.
data.short_description: Multiplayer 3D theater to experience videos in an immersive way using Virtual Reality. Watch movie trailers and your own videos in a realistic, high quality environment.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 or later
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 or later
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD R9 290 or later
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
